txt.en: Ost Elendil, the great palace of the kings of old, is on the island beyond the bridge of Ariant. At its base is the entrance to Haudh Valandil, the tomb of Valandil son of Isildur. I fear that the tomb, long-undisturbed, has become the home to great evils: both of Angmar's design and otherwise.
Limrafn stalk Haudh Valandil, the tomb on the island beyond the bridge of Ariant, in Ann√∫minas.\n\nYou should defeat the limrafn that stalk the depths of Haudh Valandil.
